title: Russia Takes the Gulag Out of the Gulag History Museum in Moscow
summary_full: The museum had preserved the history of brutality inflicted by the Soviet Union on its people. It will now focus on Nazi war crimes.
summary_public: The museum had preserved the history of brutality inflicted by the Soviet Union on its people. It will now focus on Nazi war crimes.
